summary:
**Meeting Overview**:  
The Ad Hoc Committee on Administrative Affairs of the Dallas City Council will convene on August 19, 2024, at 11:30 AM. The meeting will be held both in-person at City Hall and virtually, with the primary purpose of discussing the search for a new city manager.

**Key Agenda Items**:  
1. Approval of minutes from the June 3, 2024, meeting.
2. Discussion on the city manager search, focusing on desired qualifications, community and employee survey results, and a brochure prepared by Baker Tilly.

**Important Details**:  
The committee will review the qualifications sought for the new city manager based on feedback from community and employee surveys. The discussion will also include insights from a prepared brochure that outlines the search process.

**Action Items**:  
The committee is expected to approve the minutes from the previous meeting and make decisions regarding the qualifications and criteria for the city manager search based on the discussed information. Additionally, there may be a closed executive session if legal or personnel matters arise during the discussions.

This meeting is part of the ongoing efforts to ensure effective governance and administrative management within the City of Dallas.
